category.name: Test for Follows(*), Parent(*), Modifies, Uses,pattern

id.comment: Which parent does statement 4 belongs to?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent(s,4);

id.comment: Does statement 2 has child?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent (2,s);

id.comment: Select all the statements which are a child of another statement.

query.querystr: stmt s1,s2; Select s2 such that Parent (s1,s2);

id.comment: Select all the parents.

query.querystr: stmt s1; Select s1 such that Parent (s1,_);

id.comment: Select all the while if there exists a parent relationship

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Parent (_,_);

id.comment: Select all the child statements if it exists

query.querystr: stmt s1; Select s1 such that Parent (_,s1);

id.comment: Is there any nested while loop?

query.querystr: while w1,w2; Select w2 such that Parent (w1,w2);

id.comment: Select assignments nested in a while loop?

query.querystr: while w;assign a; Select a such that Parent (w,a);

id.comment: Select all the parents of statement 5.

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent*(s,5);

id.comment: Select all the while loop which is/are a child of another while loop.

query.querystr: while w1,w2; Select w2 such that Parent* (w1,w2);

id.comment: Select all the assignments nested directly/indrectly in a while loop.

query.querystr: while w;assign a; Select a such that Parent* (w,a);

id.comment: Which statement does statement 3 follow?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows(s,3);

id.comment: Select statement directly follow statement 5 ?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows (5,s);

id.comment: Select all the statements which follows a while statement.

query.querystr: stmt s;while w; Select s such that Follows* (w,s);

id.comment: Select all the statements that are followed by assignment statement.

query.querystr: stmt s1; assign a; Select s1 such that Follows* (s1,a);

id.comment: Select all the while if there exists a follows* relationship

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Follows* (_,_);

id.comment: Select all the statements if it follows some statements.

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows* (_,s);

id.comment: Select while loops that are followed by some statements?

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Follows* (w,_);

id.comment: Select assignments that follow while loops?

query.querystr: while w;assign a; Select a such that Follows* (w,a);

id.comment: Select BOOLEAN if there exists a nested while and has control variable b.

query.querystr: while w; Select BOOLEAN such that Parent*(_,w) pattern w("b",_);

id.comment: Select assignment a1 that uses a while assignment a2 modifies i.

query.querystr: assign a1,a2; Select a1 such that Uses(a1,"a") pattern a2("i",_);

id.comment: Select BOOLEAN if there exists a Uses relationship.

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Parent*(w,1) pattern w("f",_);

id.comment: Select BOOLEAN if there exists an assignment Uses variable y and modifies c?

query.querystr: assign a; Select BOOLEAN such that Modifies(a,"c") pattern a("c",_"y"_);

id.comment: Select BOOLEAN if there exists an assignment modifies variable d and another asisgnmenent that y =a?

query.querystr: assign a1,a2; Select BOOLEAN such that Modifies(a1,"d") pattern a2("y","a");

id.comment: Select BOOLEAN if there exists an assignment modifies variable d and another asisgnmenent that uses b?

query.querystr: assign a1,a2; Select BOOLEAN such that Modifies(a1,"d") pattern a2("y",_"b"_);

id.comment: Which is the assigment modifies c uses q?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Modifies(a,"c") pattern a("c",_"q"_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment modifies c uses x and z?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Uses(a,"x") pattern a("c",_"z"_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment modifies c and follows some statements?

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Follows*(_,a) pattern a("c",_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment modifies c and follows some statements?

query.querystr: while w;assign a; Select w such that Parent(w,a) pattern w("b",_);
assign a;variable v; Select v pattern a(v,_"a"_);
assign a;variable v; Select v such that such that Uses(a,v) pattern a(v,_"a"_);

id.comment: Which statment is the parent of itself?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent(s,s);

id.comment: Which statment if the parent* of itself?

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Parent*(s,s);

id.comment: Which while is the parent of itself?

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Parent(w,w);

id.comment: Which while follows itself?

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Follows(w,w);

id.comment: Which statement follows itself?

query.querystr: assign s; Select s such that Follows(s,s);

id.comment: Which statement follows* itself?

query.querystr: assign s; Select s such that Follows*(s,s);
